name: qubTheme
description:
Color Theme for IntelliJ Idea's UI. Replaces white background in the most UI widgets.
      Adds a "black" editor theme with solid black background and custom foreground colors.
      The idea here it to make fonts and other elements bigger to reduce eyes efforts.
      Will keep your eyes healthy and safe for a long time!
notes: Grey Background for Tree and List and other UI widgets.
